author: Staff Reporter
text:
A man was arrested for stabbing his mother-in-law to death over domestic squabble here on Thursday. Sivaprakasam (27) was married to Muniammal (25), daughter of the victim, Ellammal (45), in Pochampalli.

The accused, an alcoholic, had physically abused his wife, following which Ellammal and her husband took their daughter along with them.

According to the police, Sivaprakasam, in an inebriated condition, went to Ellammal’s house and demanded that his wife return with him. When the parents objected, he stabbed Ellammal multiple times.

The victim was rushed to Dharmapuri Government Hospital and later referred to Salem Government Hospital, where she died on Friday morning.
title: Man stabs mother-in-law to death
